subject: AI & Agents
title: Code Generation: From Prompt to Program
description: A fast breakdown of Code Generation: From Prompt to Program for builders.

hook.text: 'Write a Python function to sort a list of dicts by key.' Done in 3 seconds.

buildup.text: Code LLMs are trained on billions of lines of code from GitHub, Stack Overflow, and docs.

discovery.text: They handle: code completion, bug fixing, refactoring, test generation, and documentation.

twist.text: Generated code can contain bugs, security flaws, and license violations. Always review.

climax.text: GitHub Copilot, Cursor, and Codeium integrate code generation directly into your editor.

punchline.text: AI writes the first draft. You write the final version.

quiz.question: What risk does AI-generated code carry?
options: Bugs, security flaws, and license violations
